attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is now confirmed Epidemiological medical research studies from every Country directly linking Cancers,Heart Diseases,Strokes,Heart Attacks,Lung Diseases,Neurological Damage,Asthma,Damage to Children and Foetus`s caused by PM2.5 Particulates and Nitrogen Dioxides from Traffic Pollution.Here in the UK these deadly PM2.5 toxins "are conveniently not monitored" why not ??
John Hall (Manchester)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
